description: This file defines and configures an AI agent with knowledge base integration, including external dependencies, and demonstrates usage by printing a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific instructions, knowledge base, tools, and model configuration.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Handles text embedding using OpenAI models.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Manages knowledge stored as URLs, integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude language model from Anthropic.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Provides reasoning utilities for the agent.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types in LanceDb.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, with options for streaming and reasoning display.
